LanguageData.Asimov.GoRechargeDescription: Seek out and recharge from the closest available charging socket/platform.
LanguageData.Asimov.BeginProcessingEarlyDesc: Allows you to manually begin the recharging process if there aren't enough empty chargepacks to fill the machine. There is no downside to doing so, other than it being a smaller quantity recharged in this run of the device.
LanguageData.Asimov.GoHibernateDescription: Seek out and hibernate at the closest available hibernation spot.
LanguageData.Asimov.AutoHibernateDescription: If enabled, when energy is low and no power source is available the pawn can use, they will seek a hibernation spot instead.
LanguageData.Asimov.LowEnergyHibernation: {0} is going to hibernate due to a lack of energy and no usable sources.
LanguageData.Asimov.NoHibernationSpot: No reachable and unreserved hibernation spot found.
LanguageData.Asimov.FirstColorDescription: Changes the primary colour of the pawn.
LanguageData.Asimov.SecondColorDescription: Changes the secondary colour of the pawn.
LanguageData.Asimov.HexColorCodeIsIllFormer: Hex color code is not valid.
LanguageData.Asimov.Setting_EnergyNeedNote: Low should always be more than Desperate, best is to separate them by 5-10% at minimum.
LanguageData.Asimov.Setting_LowThresholdNote: The level at which automatons with an energy need will begin considering looking to recharge but prioritize work.
LanguageData.Asimov.Setting_DesperateThresholdNote: The level at which automatons with an energy need will prioritize looking to recharge over their current tasks.
